alert.note: Alert for Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 12:26PM EST until January 06 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Preston, Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston, and Western Tucker Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Please report snow or ice accumulations by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPittsburgh.

area.areaDesc: Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker
